subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Austin Daye and DaJuan Summers combined for 53 points in the Pistons’ summer league victory over the Knicks. Jordan Hill had 14 points in his second professional game.
snippet: Austin Daye and DaJuan Summers combined for 53 points in the Pistons’ summer league victory over the Knicks. Jordan Hill had 14 points in his second professional game.
